explanation: The stage direction 'En se retournant, elle aperçoit Don Juan sur le seuil de la porte.' involves a character ('elle') seeing another character (Don Juan). This describes a non-verbal interaction between the two characters, as 'aperçoit' (sees) falls under non-verbal forms of interaction.
stgdir: En se retournant, elle aperçoit Don Juan sur le seuil de la porte.
